short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kilect image URLs as you browse for later use!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keep track of image URLs while you browse! Kilect images to save their URL and a description in a table, accessible from your toolbar.

Right click an image, and (optionally) fill in a description and add tags for indexing.

In the table, clicking on a description box will display the image. Clicking a URL box will select the entire URL.

You can edit and delete items in your Kilxn. Uncheck "Include URLs" to have your search limited to tags and description.

NOTE: If the image host deletes the image from their servers or changes its location, you will have lost the image! Download and back up any image you fear losing.
